about.title: About me
about.paragraf1: I am a Full-Stack developer passionate about technology, programming, and problem-solving. I stand out for my self-taught learning, adaptability, and teamwork.
about.paragraf2: In 2024, I graduated as a University Technician in Programming from UTN. I have experience in both backend and frontend development.
about.paragraf3: I am looking for an opportunity to apply my knowledge, continue growing professionally, and contribute with commitment and responsibility to a development team.
about.invitation: You can download my Curriculum Vitae below for more information.

exp.description: I collaborate as a Full-Stack developer, working in a team with other developers on various projects. I adapt to the project's needs, taking on roles in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as React, C#, .NET, and MySQL. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my technical and teamwork skills in a collaborative environment.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.paragraf2: I stand out for my adaptability to new technologies and teamwork, applying agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban.
tech.paragraf3: In frontend, I have developed web applications with React, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as working with animations.
tech.paragraf4: In backend, I work with C# using ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, and MySQL, allowing me to develop REST APIs and efficiently manage databases.

modalError.title: Submission Error

portfolio.title: Portfolio Samuel Carranza
portfolio.subtitle: Landing page desarrollada en React para exhibir el trabajo profesional de un fotógrafo y editor de videos.
portfolio.description: An attractive and modern landing page developed in React to highlight Samuel's professional work as a photographer and video editor. The site features an interactive gallery of photos and videos, along with sections dedicated to his career and experience. Additionally, it includes a 'About Me' section where he shares his story and passion for photography, as well as a contact form for interested clients. Its elegant and minimalist design focuses on visual content, providing an immersive experience for visitors.
portfolio.responsibilities: As a developer, I was responsible for implementing components following the design established in Figma. I prioritized a smooth and engaging user experience by developing custom elements such as an image carousel, an interactive form with error validation, and the 'About Me' section. Additionally, I optimized the design to be fully responsive, ensuring an optimal display on all devices.
